name: Mitsui & Co., Ltd.
description: Mitsui & Co., Ltd. is a leading general trading company based in Japan, with a global presence and a diverse portfolio of businesses. Founded in 1876, Mitsui has evolved into one of the largest and most influential trading houses in the world. The company engages in a wide range of activities, including the import and export of goods, investment in various industries, and the provision of services across sectors such as chemicals, food, energy, and machinery. Mitsui plays a crucial role in facilitating international trade and investment, leveraging its extensive network to connect suppliers and customers worldwide. The company is committed to sustainability and innovation, actively pursuing initiatives that contribute to the growth of society while addressing global challenges such as climate change. Through strategic partnerships and investments, Mitsui aims to create value and sustain its competitive edge in the ever-evolving global market. With a strong emphasis on corporate social responsibility, Mitsui seeks to enhance the well-being of communities and promote sustainable development through its business operations.

seo.meta_title: Mitsui & Co., Ltd. | Leading General Trading Company
seo.meta_description: Explore Mitsui & Co., Ltd., a global leader in trading and investment. Discover our diverse business portfolio and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Mitsui & Co. do?
faq.answer: Mitsui & Co. engages in international trade, investment, and a variety of business activities across multiple sectors.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Mitsui & Co.?
faq.answer: Kenichi Hori is the CEO of Mitsui & Co., Ltd.

faq.question: Where is Mitsui & Co. headquartered?
faq.answer: Mitsui & Co. is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
